---

<section class="pt-20">
<div class="entry-content">
		<p>To help you better&nbsp;understand Bitcoin the top people in the Bitcoin industry&nbsp;are interviewed by <a onclick="javascript:pageTracker._trackPageview('/outgoing/www.tracemayer.net');" title="trace mayer" href="http://www.tracemayer.net" target="_blank">Trace Mayer</a> for the Bitcoin Knowledge Podcast.</p>
<p>Trace&nbsp;is an entrepreneur, investor, journalist, monetary scientist and ardent defender of the freedom of speech. He holds accounting and law degrees and has studied Austrian economics focusing on the work of Murray Rothbard and Ludwig von Mises.</p>
